translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Vibhītaka
The Elder Vibhītakamiñjika’s Birth Story
“Kakusandha, the Great Hero,
had gone beyond all things;
He had withdrawn from the group
and gone to the forest.
Taking a seed-sprout,

analyzed: latāya āvuṇim aha  bhagavā tamhi samaye
translated: I wrapped it in a creeper;🔽At that time,
the Fortunate One was meditating in the mountains.
Seeing the God of Gods,
with a confident mind,
I gave a seed-sprout
to the Worthy One, the Hero.🔽In this very life,
the seed-sprout I gave then,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the seed-sprout.
My defilements have been burnt up,
all my existences have been destroyed;
Like an elephant who has broken his bonds,
I live without pollutants.
Welcome indeed it was for me,
in the presence of the Buddha;
The three knowledges have been attained,
and the Buddha’s message has been done.
The four analytical insights,
and the eight liberations;
The six super-knowledges have been realised,
and the Buddha’s message has been done.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā vibhītakamiñjiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai vibhītakamiñjiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus has the venerable Vibhītakamiñjika related these verses.
The first section for recitation on Vibhītakamiñjika is finished.
